#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
 
int T;
int x11,x12,y11,y12,x21,x22,y21,y22;
 
int main(){
    cin>>T;
    while(T--){
        cin>>x11>>y11>>x12>>y12;
        cin>>x21>>y21>>x22>>y22;
        int res = (x12-x11)*(y12-y11);
        res += (x22-x21)*(y22-y21);
        int x31 = max(x21,x11);
        int x32 = min(x22,x12);
        int y31 = max(y21,y11);
        int y32 = min(y22,y12);
        res -= max(x32-x31,0)*max(y32-y31,0);
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
